0:
--------------------
Text: The Finding of Moses, sometimes called Moses in the Bullrushes, Moses Saved from the Waters, or other variants, is the story in chapter 2 of the Book of Exodus in the Hebrew Bible of the finding in the River Nile of Moses as a baby by the daughter of Pharoah.
Triplets:<The Finding of Moses
1:
--------------------
Text: Finding of Moses:  The story became a common subject in art, especially from the Renaissance onwards.
